words.def: City in Brazil (Proper noun)
a theatrical performer
Alternative spelling of torque.
(ethnic slur) offensive term for a person of Mexican descent
predatory black-and-white toothed whale with large dorsal fin
an outer garment that has sleeves and covers the body from shoulder down
a heavy open wagon usually having two wheels and drawn by an animal
(of instruments in the violin family) to be played with the bow
City in Kazakhstan (Proper noun)
edible starchy tuberous root of taro plants
(Roman Catholic Church) the supreme ecclesiastical tribunal for cases appealed to the Holy See from diocesan courts
An auxiliary rocket engine  in a detachable unit that provides extra power for the takeoff of an aircraft.
South American wood sorrel cultivated for its edible tubers
Any of several large, ferocious sea creatures, now especially the killer whale .
mythical bird of prey having enormous size and strength
a motor vehicle with four wheels
feline mammal usually having thick soft fur and no ability to roar: domestic cats
a sheath worn to protect a finger
A Hebrew measure of capacity; a core or homer.
a legal document codifying the result of deliberations of a committee or society or legislative body
electrical conduction through a gas in an applied electric field
the products of human creativity
an implement used to propel or steer a boat
annual grass of Europe and North Africa
a prominent rock or pile of rocks on a hill
any of various dark heavy viscid substances obtained as a residue
an adherent of any branch of Taoism
a state of decay usually accompanied by an offensive odor
any of various long-tailed rodents similar to but larger than a mouse
Usually in plural orts A fragment; a scrap of leftover food; any remainder; a piece of refuse.
a mouth or mouthlike opening
a highly unstable radioactive element (the heaviest of the halogen series)
Toward a closed, touching or engaging position.
a hard grey lustrous metallic element that is highly resistant to corrosion
a state in northwestern United States on the Pacific
a colorless and odorless inert gas
